algorithm_technique: Single pass through the array, keeping track of the last seen indices of word1 and word2.
Update minimum distance whenever both words have been seen.
problem_summary_simple: Find the shortest distance between two different words in a list.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the word list, maintaining the indices of the last seen occurrences of word1 and word2, and calculating the minimum absolute difference.
key_insights: A single pass is sufficient to find the shortest distance.
Keeping track of the most recent indices of both words is key.
The minimum distance is updated whenever both words have been encountered.
